name: Anime Jigsaw
description:
This is the Anime Jigsaw Puzzle Game from H-ero.

Download Puzzle Pack Link:
Puzzle Pack SFW
Puzzle Pack NSFW (18+) (Patron only)

Patreon Goals:
Redesign UI ($0 / $100)
Mac OSX build ($0 / $300)

Features:

  • Downloadable puzzle pack.
  • Save unlocked artwork to disk.

Minimum Requirement:
Any GPU that support OpenGL 2.0
Basically any PC/Notebook/Netbook in this day and age can run it. Unless you still use an ancient PC.

Complaint:
If you have any complaint about this game please email us to:
h-ero [dot] games [at] yandex [dot] com

Bug report and Feature Request:
If you encounter a bug or want to request a feature please go to:
Our github
Or press [B] or [F] while in the game.
